ingredients: 8 chicken sausages (pick a flavor that pairs well with the kraut, like apple and onion) or chicken hot dogs
3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 3 turns of the pan
1 small green apple, peeled and diced
1 small head red cabbagequartered, cored and shredded
1 teaspoon cumin seeds or 2 teaspoons ground cumin
1 tablespoon grill seasoning, such as McCormick Montreal Steak Seasoning (a palmful)
8 hot dog buns, split and toasted
